question: You have just read an article in an international travel magazine which contained some information about your town that is incorrect.Write a letter to the editor of the magazine. In your letter correct the information in the article. Explain why it is important for the magazine to give correct information. Suggest what the magazine should do about the situation.
text: Hello, I wish everything could be all right.
I am writing this letter because last week I studied some incorrect information about my beautiful town which name is Sari.

In your magazine, I read that there is a river in my town which is the spring in little bay, but it is not correct because there are two rivers in my city which are springs in the Khazar ocean. Furthermore, you should  correct this information because if someone recognizes your incorrect data and tells  other people, that adults could not  trust your famous magazine then your paper sheet could not  sell and your income is getting decreases.
I suggest  that is better to publish the correct data. Besides, you should  apologize to people and say that it never happens again.
Also, is better to hire someone who knows  many details about cities and countries to release correct information.
If there are some questions about my hometown, please call me.
